title: GoldTube
author: GoldTube
content: Hey members, Have anyone tried Kaiko market data API plans before? Any comment on the product and service? Cheers!

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: I tried to check them it seems they it's a crypto data aggregator no one has yet given any reviews using this I search here on the forum but only a few people mention it.I also tried to check Google but I can't find reviews related to any of their services except for fake reviews on glassdoor.Why not try to use their Pro/Enterprise API plan according to them they are offering a free trial and then make a review here.
